name: Vectronom
detailed_description:
Vectronom is a challenging platformer combined with rhythm based gameplay.
Try to complete each level while the ground under your feet keeps on mutating with the rhythm of intense electronic music. Every fall will only make it harder to quit. Get back on track and see how far you can go! The trick is to memorize patterns, catch the right moment and dance through the game world.
Vectronom also features original soundtracks created specifically for each level, that will make the game a wholly addicting experience.

Story


You are a tumbling cube in a world ruled by music, flashing colors and geometric shapes. While the structure of each level changes with the music, you can build momentum to experience the perfect flow, or keep the rhythm and wait until the time is right again to solve the puzzle.
Challenge your sense of rhythm and let the music guide you through the pitfalls of each level!

How to play


Playing is as simple as using the arrow keys (or WASD). We recommend headphones or loud speakers when playing, the key is to feel the beat seamlessly and keep up with it.

Features


  • Enjoy a challenging single player campaign with 27 different levels to complete
  • Each level features original electronic beats and a striking, minimalist art style
  • Play with friends via local, drop-in/drop-out multiplayer
  • Hook up the game to an analogue synthesizer via gate click and compose live music as you play along!
  • Use alternative controllers like dance pads or MIDI instruments

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
